definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He flung up an arm to ward off the blow.
sentences.chinese: 他挥起手臂挡开这一拳。

sentences.english: One of his hands, as I have said, held the umbrella: in the other arm he carried several brown-paper parcels.
sentences.chinese: 他一只手撑着伞，另一只手臂抱着几个棕色的纸包。

sentences.english: The marquis took his arm, and they left the salon.
sentences.chinese: 侯爵挽起了他的手臂，同他一起走出客厅。

sentences.english: I felt a touch on my arm.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得手臂上有人摸了一下。

sentences.english: There, robotic arms transfer the fuel into storage cassettes underwater.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，机器手臂将燃料转移到水下的储藏容器里。

sentences.english: After surgery you will be given intravenous fluids (IV’s) in your arm.
sentences.chinese: 手术后，你将在手臂上被给予静脉输液。

sentences.english: Roger went across to the bed and put his hand on her arm.It was cold.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰走到床前把手放在她的手臂上，尸体已经冷了。

sentences.english: But you do need to hit every single shot with your arm.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必须需要一个强壮的手臂来击打每一个回球。

sentences.english: We have not bound your feet with our entreating arms.
sentences.chinese: 我们不曾用恳求的手臂来抱住你的双足。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒样子凶猛，肩膀宽阔，手臂很长，牙齿尖锐。

sentences.english: To bend the arm at the elbow, the muscle at the front of the upper arm has to shorten and bunch up.
sentences.chinese: 要从肘部弯曲手臂，就要收缩上臂正面的肌肉。

sentences.english: Isadora liked to move her arms and legs in very smooth motions.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎多拉喜欢用非常流畅的动作摆动手臂和腿脚。

sentences.english: She ups with her brawny arm.
sentences.chinese: 她举起了自己强壮的手臂。

sentences.english: The orc breaks Valeera's arm and throws her into the corner.
sentences.chinese: 兽人攀折了瓦蕾拉的手臂，并将其丢到了角落里。

sentences.english: Seven. You will feel this immediately in your arms.
sentences.chinese: 用力推，七，你的手臂很快就会有感觉。

sentences.english: It has an easy mounting solution thanks to the optional wall-mount arm.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个易于安装的解决方案由于可选的壁挂式手臂。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
